text: tagmus 7.5% Otitis media 7.5% Preauricular skin tag 7.5% Proximal placement of thumb 7.5% Scoliosis 7.5% Strabismus 7.5% Thick lower lip vermilion 7.5% Triangular face 7.5% Upslanted palpebral fissure 7.5% Ventricular septal defect 7.5% Visual impairment 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
